column1: Willie was a very little child and lived near a mill. One day he saw a big cruel boy come along and throw a little puppy into the mill-pond
column2: and then run away. Willie cried out: "O Papa
column4: do come here!""What is the matter?" said his papa."Oh
column5: Papa! I want the little doggie! Please get him for me. He will be drowned!"His papa took a long pole and put it under the puppy's neck and pulled it out of the water and gave it to Willie. He was very happy with his dog
column11: and was named Diver. He used to go with Willie everywhere the boy went
column12: and he loved Willie very much. Everybody said: "What a beautiful dog!" and Willie was proud of him.
